assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for publication of individual details and images was obtained in the context of the Helsmoortel–Van der Aa syndrome from the parents. The protocol was approved by the Ethics Committee of the Antwerp University Hospital, Antwerp, Belgium.
